contact.title: Send me a message
contact.intro: Feel free to leave me a message, I will get back to you as soon as possible

content: I am a web developer specialised in Symfony and React with a vast knowledge around the javascript ecosystem, I love React since I started to use it and I am building more and more project with it.

I am a fast learner and I am passionate about learning, I read articles about everything, not only about new technologies and software development but also mathematics, sciences, business and psychology. I spend my time on TED and Medium just reading and thinking.

I also spent a year in Australia where I improved my english, learned a new culture and challenged myself in a new life far from home. I play badminton and tennis when I need to get out and free up my mind.
